name: hyperspy-base
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: hyperspy-base
    version: 1.5.2
source:
    fn: hyperspy-1.5.2.tar.gz
    sha256: 5271fd3fa3e437ea9aaa201cd1724f5cd60e53dcc0741a74e86d55ea1b101ff6
    url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/h/hyperspy/hyperspy-1.5.2.tar.gz
build:
    noarch: false
    number: '2'
    script: install.bat
    string: py37h4ab8f01_2
requirements:
    build:
        - vs2017_win-64 19.16.27038 h2e3bad8_2
        - vswhere 2.7.1 h21ff451_0
    host:
        - ca-certificates 2020.4.5.1 hecc5488_0
        - certifi 2020.4.5.1 py37hc8dfbb8_0
        - cython 0.29.17 py37h1834ac0_0
        - openssl 1.1.1g he774522_0
        - pip 20.1 pyh9f0ad1d_0
        - python 3.7.6 h60c2a47_5_cpython
        - python_abi 3.7 1_cp37m
        - setuptools 46.2.0 py37hc8dfbb8_0
        - sqlite 3.30.1 hfa6e2cd_0
        - vc 14.1 h869be7e_1
        - vs2015_runtime 14.16.27012 h30e32a0_2
        - wheel 0.34.2 py_1
        - wincertstore 0.2 py37_1003
    run:
        - dask >=0.18
        - dill
        - h5py
        - imageio
        - ipyparallel
        - ipython
        - matplotlib-base >2.2.2
        - mrcz
        - natsort
        - numba
        - numexpr
        - numpy >1.13
        - pillow >5.2
        - pint >0.8,<0.10
        - ptable
        - python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0
        - python-dateutil >=2.5
        - python_abi 3.7.* *_cp37m
        - pyyaml
        - requests
        - scikit-image >=0.13,<0.17
        - scikit-learn
        - scipy >=0.15,<1.4
        - sparse
        - statsmodels
        - sympy <1.5
        - tqdm >=0.4.9
        - traits >=4.5
        - vc >=14.1,<15.0a0
        - vs2015_runtime >=14.16.27012
test:
    commands:
        - set MPLBACKEND=agg
        - pytest --pyargs hyperspy --mpl
    imports:
        - hyperspy
        - hyperspy.Release
        - hyperspy._components
        - hyperspy._lazy_signals
        - hyperspy._signals
        - hyperspy.api
        - hyperspy.api_nogui
        - hyperspy.axes
        - hyperspy.component
        - hyperspy.components1d
        - hyperspy.components2d
        - hyperspy.datasets
        - hyperspy.decorators
        - hyperspy.defaults_parser
        - hyperspy.docstrings
        - hyperspy.drawing
        - hyperspy.drawing._markers
        - hyperspy.drawing._widgets
        - hyperspy.events
        - hyperspy.exceptions
        - hyperspy.external
        - hyperspy.external.astroML
        - hyperspy.external.mpfit
        - hyperspy.interactive
        - hyperspy.io
        - hyperspy.io_plugins
        - hyperspy.learn
        - hyperspy.logger
        - hyperspy.misc
        - hyperspy.misc.eds
        - hyperspy.misc.eels
        - hyperspy.misc.holography
        - hyperspy.misc.io
        - hyperspy.misc.machine_learning
        - hyperspy.model
        - hyperspy.models
        - hyperspy.roi
        - hyperspy.samfire
        - hyperspy.samfire_utils
        - hyperspy.samfire_utils.goodness_of_fit_tests
        - hyperspy.samfire_utils.segmenters
        - hyperspy.samfire_utils.weights
        - hyperspy.signal
        - hyperspy.signal_tools
        - hyperspy.signals
        - hyperspy.ui_registry
        - hyperspy.utils
    requires:
        - freetype >=2.9,<2.10
        - matplotlib-base >=3.1,<3.2
        - pytest <4.1
        - pytest-mpl
about:
    dev_url: https://github.com/hyperspy/hyperspy/
    doc_url: http://hyperspy.org/hyperspy-doc/current/user_guide/index.html
    home: https://hyperspy.org
    license: GPL-3.0-or-later
    license_file: COPYING.txt
    summary: Multi-dimensional data analysis
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ericpre
        - francisco-dlp
